Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream peanut butter and sugar.  Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition (dough will be sticky).  With floured hands, roll tablespoonfuls into 1-1/4-in. balls.  Place 2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 14-16 minutes or until tops are cracked.  Remove to wire racks.  Immediately press a chocolate star in the center of each.  Cool.
